name: Tricky Shot IQ Tricks
description:
Tricky shot IQ tricks has 200 active levels and every level need different technique to solve it.
Lets play it and know how genius and smart you are.
Find out your correct angle to throw ball to a right direction.
Throw ball by measuring power and direction at the time of release. Change the power or direction after a failure. Lets know how many shots you need to clear a single level.

Its really a fun for all ages.
